Awesome game would recommend it to anyone who asks about it. Compeditive is a bit negative you cant see your own elo which is teriible and no one knows how the elo works which is also very bad not only that but you cant quee up with people that are a certain amout of ranks higher or lower than you which i agree with but unfortunately even though you cant quee with them the game throws those ranks in your lobby which doesnt make sense you could be ranked very high and recieve someone very low in your team by random and could cause u a derank or you could be low and play against high ranks which could restrain u from ranking up. That's an old game, but still good. But the experience becomes worse everyday, with bad nerfs and buffs, the anti-cheat being very slow, the "trust launch mode" that makes impossible the usage of Nvidia Filters for exemple, and having to restart the game after each non-official server entrance (community servers, or local server to play vs. bots etc). The matchmaking system and ranking system are mysteries and bad too, you queue with silent or loud russians most of the time, sometimes they grief and throw the match for no reason. Then the trust factor is something too, i'm a normal player, not toxic not griefing, just a normal player and I have a bad trust factor god knows why. So now I queue with griefers and cheaters even more than usual. Thank you Valve for this game, that is truly good but you have been destroying it for years.
